pages.title: Pistons
pages.text: Pistons can now move tile entities, keeping all data intact.$(br2)Additionally, $(item)Chains/$ can connect blocks when pushed by pistons if they are visually connected to the $(item)Chains/$. This also applies to $(item)Slime Blocks/$ and $(item)Honey Blocks/$, which will only connect to $(item)Chains/$ if they connect visually.

pages.title: Hoppers
pages.text: $(item)Hoppers/$ have been removed in favor of more interesting options which fill the same role such as $(bold)$(l:getting_started/transport#chute)Chutes/$ and $(bold)$(l:getting_started/transport#funnel)Funnels/$.

pages.title: Detection
pages.text: $(item)Comparators/$ and $(item)Observers/$ have had their recipes changed to include the $(bold)$(l:advanced_automation/adv_circuits#redstone_eye)Redstone Eye/$.
